data.text: @mkraju Nancy is right about one thing: Dems are revolting.
@mkraju Do you think there is anything that can be done to reinstate COVID funding? I'm immunocompromised and care for high-risk family members. Feeling more and more left behind...
@mkraju #speakerShitShow has destroyed America the congress and now her own criminal party! https://t.co/Sj4cscwDJT
@mkraju We will vote both sides out.

@mkraju single mom of 2 perm disabilty & before #childtaxcredit mo we were homeless over a yr. until Aug 1 2021. No gov helped us. denied foodcard in FL. Can’t buy kids food,clothes, necessities&we will end up homeless again. When do the 4 MIL matter? @SenateDems @HouseDemocrats @POTUS
@mkraju The GOP won’t vote for it anyway, so why keep vowing to them???

@mkraju They've already passed $3Trillion or $4Trillion in Covid relief the past two years.  I've frankly lost count.  Why they are still trying to slip more into every new bill that comes along shows how morally and fiscally bankrupt Nancy's Congress is right now.

@mkraju More money for military to be used by a foreign country. Less money for Americans and Covid relief. Republicans openly don't care about you. Democrats pretend to care about you. Pick your poison.
@mkraju Good thing they fund Space Force, gave extra money to the Department of Defense, and didn't roll back tax breaks for the rich. 🙄
